Welcome! I am currently an assistant professor at the department of Business and Management Science at the Norwegian School of Economics (NHH).



Education

Ph.D. in Finance, 2023
Norwegian School of Economics, Norway
M.Sc. in Finance with research distinction, 2018
Norwegian School of Economics, Norway
B.Sc. in Economics and Business Administration, 2016
Norwegian School of Economics



Interests

Asset management
Investments
Household finance
